name: Face
description: The charismatice front-runner of the group, usually the leader. Works with Mr. Johnson the most. The bard and the salesman.

name: Spellcaster
description: The mage that attacks the darkness with magic missile. Logical and ordered magician compared to Shamans who are more instictual. You need Magic to succeed.

name: Decker
description: The hacker of the group - able to enter The Matrix at will via their cyberdeck.

name: Technomancer
description: The other hacker of the group - able to enter The Matrix with just their minds - no deck required. Unknown how that works. Must have Resonance.

name: Rigger
description: The driver - able to control cars, drones, and aircraft at will.

name: Street Samurai
description: The tank and the killer - he knows 15 ways to hurt an opponent and an additional 8 ways to really hurt an opponent.
